pkgmetadata.longdescription: Obtain Alpha-Outlier Regions for Well-Known Probability Distributions // Given the parameters of a distribution, the package uses the concept of alpha-outliers by Davies and Gather (1993) to flag outliers in a data set. See Davies, L.; Gather, U. (1993): The identification of multiple outliers, JASA, 88 423, 782-792, doi: 10.1080/01621459.1993.10476339 for details.
